name: ANDBRA
description:
COME ON, DO YOU THINK YOU CAN SEE THE CREATURE OF THE FOREST UP CLOSE?

Andbra is a dream game about a traveller who decides to fulfill his dreams and go out to search the world for all those creatures that he heard about when he was little and that remained ringing in his memory.

Key Features

  • Open world third person game
  • Single player
  • Control of graphic settings
  • Beautiful scenery
  • Numerous misshapen enemies around the stage
  • Relaxing sounds

Controls

Mouse and keyboard or Control

Player movement:  (W, A, S, D) ; or left stick

Camera movement: Mouse or right stick

Jump: (SPACE BAR) or A 

Follow me:
